form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Form G-135aA

full_text: Form G-135a Agency Name Check Copied (Rev. 8-1-60) at the UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE 432-P-17982 District Immigration and Naturalization Service File No. Miami, Fla. A10 891 711 National Place photograph in this space Sub-Office Date 10/2/62 Andives INVESTIGATIONS SECTION: Another Agency advised that OSI, 4th (44-8374) Please conduct the requisite character investigation the titodal seing cannot person johose photograph is at- tached. Witnesses interviewed should be. preferably, United States citizens or aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL 10/28/05 STATUS S M STANGEL, Herbert PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or PRESENT NATIONALITY state & country) D W Vienna, Austria Gr. Britain ALIASES (Identify maiden names or nicknames) PARENTS NAMES (Include present address, if known) HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS Middle & index fingers, 6'2" 185 brn brn fair left hand, amputated to 1st joints RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 900 S. Highland Ave. Clearwater, Fla. PRIOR RESIDENCES, IF AVAILABLE EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS (Employer's name and address) OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION FROM TO Minneapolis-Honeywell, St. Petersburg,Fla. Engineer PRIOR OCCUPATIONS (Not included in above) SPOUSE (Full name & other names used, & present address, if not same as above) DATE OF BIRTH 12/18/05 Milada Stangel PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state & country) Vesely, Czech. ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) None LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports or if numerous, list years when previously in U. S.) 4/27/57, Detroit. Mich. Permanent Res. PREVIOUS NUMBERS ASSIGNED (Milit, S/N; passport, social security; FBI; etc., identify each) PREVIOUS REPORTS FURNISHED BY FBI NO YES. If yes attach list of reports. REASON FOR REQUEST DEPORTATION OTHER (Specify) APPLICANT FOR: PROCEEDINGS BENEF. PB #: ADM TO U.S. ADJ. OF STATUS SPONSOR PB #: FOR RELIEF OF NATZ REMARKS: Please execute the report or the investigation on the reverse of this form and return it with any necessary attachments to the undersigned.
